channel.title: SciBesties
channel.googleplay:author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
channel.author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
channel.itunes:author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
channel.description: Tackling myths and tall tales in the life sciences and more.
channel.itunes:summary: Tackling myths and tall tales in the life sciences and more.

item.author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
item.itunes:author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
item.title: Episode 1 - Pilot ; Covid and Vaccines
item.itunes:summary: In the inaugural episode of SciBesties, we tackle misinformation surrounding vaccines and the history of vaccine hesitancy from the industrial revolution to post-COVID.
item.description: In the inaugural episode of SciBesties, we tackle misinformation surrounding vaccines and the history of vaccine hesitancy from the industrial revolution to post-COVID.

item.author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
item.itunes:author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
item.title: Episode 2 - Raw Milk and Tuberculosis
item.itunes:summary: This week, we're talking all about raw milk and the hazards of the new-age health movement. Is raw milk really better for you?
item.description: This week, we're talking all about raw milk and the hazards of the new-age health movement. Is raw milk really better for you?

item.author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
item.itunes:author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
item.title: Episode 3 - Why are people scared of GMOs?
item.itunes:summary: This episode is all about GMO's or Genetically Modified Organisms. We explore what makes a GMO and how they affect human health and the environment.
item.description: This episode is all about GMO's or Genetically Modified Organisms. We explore what makes a GMO and how they affect human health and the environment.

item.author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
item.itunes:author: Makenzie Meikle, Sophia Kvachneva
item.title: Episode 4 - On Being a Woman in STEM
item.itunes:summary: This week we highlight some of the most influential women in STEM fields and discuss the stereotypes and bias that come with being a woman in STEM.
item.description: This week we highlight some of the most influential women in STEM fields and discuss the stereotypes and bias that come with being a woman in STEM.
